blocks.subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC
text: Sure, I have a meeting w/ Mark at 3.  Other than that, I'm open.

blocks.subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC
raw_header: Subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC
text: Jason:  fyi.  Also, Randy Curry did call me yesterday but wasn't available
Also, let's get Sakura Dellsher executed (and we should create a file since
we're noting the ADM agreement which we did for Bridgeline).  Could we please
talk this afternoon about outstanding agreements?  ss

blocks.subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC
raw_header: ----- Forwarded by Sara Shackleton/HOU/ECT on 06/07/2000 09:49 AM -----

blocks.subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC
raw_header: Subject: Re: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC
text: I think this should be a high priority once they take on an ISDA attorney.
Per your recommendation, I contacted Randy Curry, President of Bridgeline and
passed along your thoughts about Jason.  I gave him your phone number and he
sounded enthusiastic about wanting to talk with him.  God knows they need an
Right now, I think we can take this off the priority list.

blocks.subject: Bridgeline Gas Marketing, LLC
text: Brant:  Is this really high priority (for our legal/credit discussions)?  We
haven't heard from these guys since April 13.  Sara
